definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: kōr, a measure (usu. dry), = [[חׂמֶר]] (Ez Eze 45:14 cf. v:Eze 45:11) (NH [[כּוֹר]], Aram. [[כּוֹרָא]], kuro0; hence, as loan-words, Gk. ko/rov, Ar. kur=un Frä:207; √ dub.; [[כרה]], Lag:Or. ii. 30, cf. Id:BN 40, 156; [[כרר]], Nö:ZMG 1886, xi, 734; Dl:Prol. 113 comp. As. kâry, and der. Fr. [[כור]] (but see now kâru Dl:HWB 349));—[[סׂלֶת]] ´[[כ]] 1Ki 5:2; [[קָָמַח]] ´[[כ]] v:1Ki 5:2; of [[חִטִּים]] v:1Ki 5:11 a; pl. [[כּׂרִים]] of ´[[ח]] and [[שְׂעׂרִים]] 2Ch 2:9, 2Ch 2:9, 2Ch 27:5; [[הַכּׂר]] as liquid measure (of oil) Ez Eze 45:14. See further Benz:Arch. 183 ff. Now:Arch. i. 203, and, on capacity, v. III. [[חׂמֶר]] p. 330 f. supr.; in 1Ki 5:25 b rd. [[בַּת שֶׁמֶן]] for MT ´[[כּׂר שׁ]] (cf. LXX. and 2Ch 2:9).
